variable.name: clinic
variable.description: De-identified DCCT clinic number

variable.name: edicyear
variable.description: EDIC year

variable.name: foa1
variable.description: A1. How satisfied are you with the amount of time it takes to manage diabetes?

variable.name: foa10
variable.description: A10. How satisfied are you with your sex life?

variable.name: foa11
variable.description: A11. How satisfied are you with your work, school and household activities

variable.name: foa12
variable.description: A12. How satisfied are you with your appearance of your body?

variable.name: foa13
variable.description: A13. How satisfied are you with your time spent exercising?

variable.name: foa14
variable.description: A14. How satisfied are you with your leisure time?

variable.name: foa15
variable.description: A15. How satisfied are you with your life in general?

variable.name: foa16
variable.description: A16. How satisfied are you with your school performance?

variable.name: foa17
variable.description: A17. How satisfied are you with how classmates treat you?

variable.name: foa18
variable.description: A18. How satisfied are you with your attendance in school?

variable.name: foa19
variable.description: A19. How satisfied are you with your health assessment?

variable.name: foa2
variable.description: A2. How satisfied are you with the amount of time you spent getting checkups?

variable.name: foa3
variable.description: A3. How satisfied are you with the time it takes to determine your sugar level?

variable.name: foa4
variable.description: A4. How satisfied are you with your current treatment?

variable.name: foa5
variable.description: A5. How satisfied are you with the flexibility you have in your diet?

variable.name: foa6
variable.description: A6. How satisfied are you with you with the burden your diabetes is placing on your family?

variable.name: foa7
variable.description: A7. How satisfied are you with your knowledge about diabetes?

variable.name: foa8
variable.description: A8. How satisfied are you with your sleep?

variable.name: foa9
variable.description: A9. How satisfied are you with your social relationships?

variable.name: fob1
variable.description: B1. How often do you feel pain associated with the treatment of your diabetes?

variable.name: fob10
variable.description: B10. How often do your diabetes interfere with your sex life?

variable.name: fob11
variable.description: B11. How often does your diabetes keep you from driving or using machine?

variable.name: fob12
variable.description: B12. How often does your diabetes interfere with your exercising?

variable.name: fob13
variable.description: B13. How often do you miss work, school / household duties because of your diabetes?

variable.name: fob14
variable.description: B14. How often do you find yourself explaining what it means to have diabetes?

variable.name: fob15
variable.description: B15. How often do you find that your diabetes interrupts your leisure time activities?

variable.name: fob16
variable.description: B16. How often do you tell others about your diabetes?

variable.name: fob17
variable.description: B17. How often do you teased because you have diabetes?

variable.name: fob18
variable.description: B18. How often do you feel that because of your diabetes you go to bathroom more often then others?

variable.name: fob19
variable.description: B19. How often do you find you eat something you shouldn't rather than tell someone that you have diabetes?

variable.name: fob2
variable.description: B2. How often do you embarrassed by having to deal with your diabetes in public?

variable.name: fob20
variable.description: B20. How often do you hide from other the fact that you are having an insulin reaction?

variable.name: fob21
variable.description: B21. How often do you find that your diabetes prevents you from participating in school activities?

variable.name: fob22
variable.description: B22. How often do you find that your diabetes prevents going out to eat with school friends?

variable.name: fob23
variable.description: B23. How often do you find that your diabetes is limiting your career?

variable.name: fob24
variable.description: B24. How often do you find that your parents are too protective of you?

variable.name: fob25
variable.description: B25. How often do you find that your parents worry too much about your diabetes?

variable.name: fob26
variable.description: B26. How often do you find that close family members teases you about your diabetes?

variable.name: fob27
variable.description: B27. How often do you find that your parents act like diabetes is their disease, not yours?

variable.name: fob3
variable.description: B3. How often do you have low blood sugar?

variable.name: fob4
variable.description: B4. How often do you feel physically ill?

variable.name: fob5
variable.description: B5. How often does your diabetes interfere with your family life?

variable.name: fob6
variable.description: B6. How often do you have bad night's sleep?

variable.name: fob7
variable.description: B7. How often do you find your diabetes limiting your social relationships and friendship?

variable.name: fob8
variable.description: B8. How often do you feel good about yourself?

variable.name: fob9
variable.description: B9. How often do you feel restricted by your diet?

variable.name: foc1
variable.description: C1. How often do you worry about whether you will get married?

variable.name: foc10
variable.description: C10. How often do you worry that you will get comp locations from your diabetes?

variable.name: foc11
variable.description: C11. How often do you worry about whether someone will not go out with you because you have diabetes?

variable.name: foc12
variable.description: C12. How often do you worry that your teachers treat you differently because of your diabetes?

variable.name: foc13
variable.description: C13. How often do you worry that your diabetes will disrupt your school activity?

variable.name: foc14
variable.description: C14. How often do you worry that because of your diabetes you are behind in herms of dating, going to parties, and keeping up with your friends?

variable.name: foc2
variable.description: C2. How often do you worry about whether you will have children?

variable.name: foc3
variable.description: C3. How often do you about whether you will not get a job you want?

variable.name: foc4
variable.description: C4. How often do you worry about whether you will pass out?

variable.name: foc5
variable.description: C5. How often do you worry about whether you will denied insurance?

variable.name: foc6
variable.description: C6. How often do you worry about whether you will be able to complete your education?

variable.name: foc7
variable.description: C7. How often do you worry about whether you will miss work?

variable.name: foc8
variable.description: C8. How often do you worry about whether you will able to take a vacation or trip?

variable.name: foc9
variable.description: C9. How often do you worry that your body looks different because you have diabetes?

variable.name: form
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: fsasdate
variable.description: De-identified date form completed

variable.name: mask_pat
variable.description: De-identified patient ID
